A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Simply put: I am disappointed in the story direction. The way this film handled the end of Luke's story was a disservice. The side plot of looking for the hacker was absolutely pointless. The fuel issues/hyperspace tracking elements were awful. So was the fact that the Rebel ships could just pluck along at sub-light speeds and magically keep ahead of every First Order ship. There wasn't a single military mind in the first order who thought it would be a good idea to jump forces around/ahead of them and head them off? The Rey/Kylo story was the only quality part of the film. Incredibly disappointing.
